courses.title: Piano Basics Course
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of playing the piano with our comprehensive beginner's course. This course covers basic music theory, finger exercises, and simple songs to get you started on your musical journey

courses.title: Guitar Mastery Workshop
courses.description: Take your guitar skills to the next level with our intermediate workshop. Explore advanced chords, techniques, and improvisation with our experienced instructors

courses.title: Vocal Techniques Masterclass
courses.description: Refine your singing technique and performance skills in this intensive masterclass. Learn about breath control, vocal range expansion, and stage presence from industry professionals

courses.title: Music Theory Crash Course
courses.description: Whether you're a beginner or an advanced musician, understanding music theory is essential. Join our crash course to learn about scales, harmony, rhythm, and more.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials for Beginners
courses.description: Discover the rhythm within you with our beginner's drumming course. Learn basic beats, fills, and coordination to kickstart your drumming journey.
